node.display_long_description:
NOW OPTIMIZED FOR QUEST 2! 

“The most unique stealth action game I’ve ever played” – VR Oasis
“Tactical kayak action – genius” – Destructoid
“Pure VR Stealth” – AusGamers

You are a Phantom: an elite covert operative with one night to prevent all-out war.

Dispatched into hostile wetlands in your military kayak, utilize weapons and equipment to neutralize enemies. Engage targets lethally or infiltrate unnoticed from the shadows across a full campaign. This is stealth action redefined.

DEADLIER ON WATER - Discover innovative VR traversal using your military kayak to freely and stealthily move across the water.
BECOME A PHANTOM - Experience the tension of becoming a lethal military asset – everything is 1:1, delivering a new level of immersion.
STEALTH ACTION - Sneak beneath enemy walkways, or ambush hostiles in exhilarating combat.
ADDITIONAL FEATURES - Multiple modes, unlockables, achievements and more.
OCULUS OPTIMIZED - Cross-buy, cross-save, cross-play, and Link support.

nodes.title: Phantom: Challenge Pack 3 Available Now!
nodes.body_text:
Today’s the day! We’re proud to announce that our third (and final) free post-launch content update for Phantom: Covert Ops is now available! Challenge Pack can be downloaded right now from the Oculus store for both Quest and Rift.

This Challenge Pack includes four all new challenges set in the Ruins of Voldat. Check out the trailer for a peek at what you’re up against…

The Challenge Pack 3 maps will be giving you a taste of some of the development team’s favourite cheats. You’ll be able to play:

Bulkhead – Similar to Challenge Pack 2’s “Figurehead” challenge, your mission is to eliminate all of the super soldiers in the ruins. This time headshots might be a little easier thanks to the classic big head mode cheat being active!

Shanty Sounds – A fairly standard assassination mission… but your weapons won’t shut up! The Acapella Weapons cheat is active and will make the whole experience a lot sillier.

Slippery When Wet – You thought that Challenge Pack 1’s “Unfathomable” time trial was difficult? Try kayaking on ice in this speedrun through the Ruins!  Pro tip: bring a barf bag.

In The Flow – Last but not least is one final target hunt in the Ruins. Don’t worry too much about accuracy, we’ve packed you with infinite ammo to make things just a little bit easier!

node.reviewDescription: I'm only 2 missions in but having a blast so far. The kayak mechanics are great and not at all annoying like I thought they might be. I really enjoy the stealth game play and there's something really cool about having all your gear (magazines, etc) attached to your kayak in an intuitive and immersive way. Some people do report motion sickness but I found the game to be very comfortable over all. The Quest graphics are pretty great, all things considered. The beginning of the game where you're exiting a helicopter feels super immersive and sets up the mood nicely. I love that there's no annoying tutorial. The game does a fantastic job of teaching you while you go without it being boring. I'm recommending this to every VR gamer I know.
